Text: Tack!  Nu är det bara Tribunal kvar då ?

Lite mer an sa;
Vendetta (TV version)
Hamilton (TV version)
Tribunal, och
"Kvällspressen
Regissör: Mats Arehn/Mikael Hylin
Skådepelare: Peter Haber,Lennart R Svensson,Göran Graffman,Irma Schultz,Sten Johan Hedman,Gert Fylking,Gösta Bredefeldt,Anne-Li Norberg,Ingvar Hirdwall,Maria Grip,
År: 1992
Kommentar: Ett avsnitt ur serien Kvällspressen som behandlar fenomenet Hamilton från svenska underrättelsetjänsten."

Jag har "hittat" foljande delar av Hamilton filmerna/serierna som annu inte varit uppe pa TBP. Jag raknar med att kunna lagga upp dem mot slutet av manaden, eller i borjan av Januari. Det ar en fraga om logistiska och finasiella problem, da jag "hittat" VHS kasetterna i Sverige, men jag sjalv bor i USA. Dessutom, maste jag forst konvertera dem till digitalt format;
[B]Vendetta[/B] (TV version) - Stefan Sauk som Carl Hamilton,
[B]Hamilton[/B] (TV version) - Peter Stormare som Carl Hamilton,
[B]Tribunal[/B] - Stefan Sauk som Carl Hamilton,
och overaskningen;
[B]Kvällspressen[/B] (TV-serie 1992) - Peter Haber som Carl Hamilton,
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0103462/
Ett avsnitt ur serien Kvällspressen som behandlar fenomenet Hamilton från svenska underrättelsetjänsten.

Uppdatering foljer.

Man tackar, avmaskad o klar (inga svarta kanter alltså)! Drog ner originalfilen först men det här ju betydligt smidigare, särskilt som formatet är 1.66:1 (tror jag, det är inte vanlig 16:9 iaf) vilket är problematiskt med icke anamorfiska filmer på min tv...

Kan du inte göra en ny avi av Förhöret oxå? ;)

All credit goes to harryhaffa who made an excellent TV-rip. I just passed his rip through AutoGK, asked for 700MB and an MP3 CBR of 96kb/s. I then waited for about 10 hours and there it was, ready to be seeded.
I wonder how I will manage to get the VHS's correctly converted, I guess we'll see.
I will try another go on Forhoret and try to pay better attention to the result before seeding, stay tuned.

The above stated VHS's has allegidely been mailed from Sweden, meaning I will have them in approx. 2 weeks. I probaly need another week or so to convert into XviD (a new experience for me, any help would be appreciated) I have a PAL VCR, iuVCR (also the MPEG2 pack plug-in) software and a Diamond XtremeTV PVR660 USB 2.0 tuner.
I addition the the 3 films/series mentioned above, I also expect to receive "Beck - Roseanna" (1967 version with Keve Hjelm as Martin Beck), "Den Svarta Cirkeln" (1990) and "Profitorerna" (1983) - something to look forward to....
The series can be somewhat lengthy why I don't know to what size I can make the compression. I will try not to go beyond 1400MB per series.
My upload speed (70 kb/s, max) woun't allow me to make DVD-R copies. No FIOS where I live, yet.

Update to be posted....

btw,
in "Profitorerna", Sven Wollter is playing Bo Jarnebring, and in "Den Svarta Cirkeln", Stefan Sauk is playing Johan Nordenskiold.

Any help for this project would be most welcome. See my post in the forum;
http://suprbay.org/showthread.php?t=9410
If everything turns out well, I will also bring over (purchase) the complete 2 seasons of Anna Holt: Polis, as well as Den Vite Riddaren.
Tjena.. Tack för Filmerna :)  Men du råkar inte ha Den Demokratiske terroristen, Tribunal och den nyaste  Hamilton??  Om du har dom Snälla Lägg upp dem här :)    Tack på förhand :D

I just received, yesterday, four Hamilton collectables, VHS format;
Hamilton (TV - 4 episodes)
Vendetta (TV- 6 episodes)
Tribunal
Kvallspressen, as well as
Roseanna (the original Beck-film from 1967)
I will work on converting and getting them up in the next few weeks.

I also put in a follow up order, that I normally will receive during February, also VHS, for;
Anna Holt: Polis (TV - season 1, 11 episodes)
Profitorerna (TV - 3 episodes)
Den Svarta Cirkeln (TV - 5 episodes)
Den Vite Riddaren (TV - 4 episodes)
Forhoret (Hamilton, a new clean version), and
Juloratoriet
I realize this will take time, but be patient and I will bring them up.....

OK, I finally got around to do this, they look like sh*t, but you can't find them elsewhere, just live with it.
